product_name: REI Frostland Hat with Strap - Toddler Girls'
long_description: Offering plenty of warmth for your baby girl, the REI Frostland hat with strap extends down to protect her ears from winter's chill. Warm, breathable fleece construction dries quickly, insulates even when wet and is easy to care for. Fleece lining adds insulation to help keep her warm in winter conditions. Chin strap with rip-and-stick closure secures hat in windy weather.
short_description: Offering plenty of warmth for your baby girl, the REI Frostland hat with strap extends down to protect her ears from winter's chill.
